info.title: Sayenly API Documentation
info.description:
# Sayenly API Documentation

Welcome to the Sayenly API! Sayenly is a comprehensive home services platform that connects customers with trusted service providers across the UAE.

## Features
- **User Management**: Registration, authentication, and profile management
- **Service Discovery**: Browse and search for various home services
- **Project Showcase**: View completed projects and service portfolios  
- **Booking System**: Schedule and manage service appointments
- **Order Management**: Request quotes and manage service orders
- **Review System**: Rate and review service providers
- **Company Profiles**: Manage service provider company information
- **FAQ System**: Access frequently asked questions
- **Notifications**: Real-time updates and communication

## Authentication
Most endpoints require authentication via Bearer tokens. Include your JWT token in the Authorization header:
```
Authorization: Bearer <your-token>
```

## Rate Limiting
API requests are rate-limited to ensure fair usage. Please respect the limits to maintain service quality.

## Support
For API support, documentation issues, or technical assistance, please contact our development team.

parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user to update

image.description: URL to the user's profile image

phoneNumber.description: User's phone number in E.164 format

post.summary: Update the FCM token for a user (deprecated)
post.description: Update a single FCM token for push notifications. This method is deprecated, use register-device instead.

400.description: Bad request - FCM token is required

post.description: Register a device to receive push notifications. This allows users to receive notifications on multiple devices (phone, tablet, etc.). Each device must be registered individually.

deviceToken.description: The Firebase Cloud Messaging (FCM) device token obtained from the client app

deviceInfo.description: Optional device information for better management and debugging

200.description: Device registered successfully for push notifications

message.example: Device registered successfully for push notifications

deviceCount.description: Total number of registered devices for this user

post.summary: Unregister a device to stop push notifications
post.description: Unregister a device to stop receiving push notifications.

deviceToken.description: The Firebase Cloud Messaging device token to unregister

200.description: Device unregistered successfully or no device found

deviceCount.description: Remaining number of registered devices for this user

400.description: Bad request - Device token is required
